description: Go for an Australian classic for dinner tonight with this chicken rissole recipe served on a bed of creamy sweet potato mash.
keywords: Chicken Rissoles With Sweet Potato Mash
name: Chicken Rissoles With Sweet Potato Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-low heat. Add rissoles and cook, in batches, for 3 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a tray and bake for 10 minutes or until cooked through. Spoon mash into serving bowls and top with rissoles. Sprinkle over chives and serve with peas.
